thread.title: Excellent location, but an overall bad experience
thread.title_full: Excellent location, but an overall bad experience - Review of Point A Hotel, London Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: cnelson2017
title: Excellent location, but an overall bad experience
text:
This was my first time staying at a Point A Hotel. The location is excellently placed. It is within walking distance of Waterloo Station and a River Thames.
The room is compact, but it is arranged to function well.
**I only warn of my bad experience as a primer. The Westminster location is under construction as on March 2017. During our stay our room was located right next to where the work was being done. We leave in a urban environment back at home, but the close proximity was just too much. I was not able to enjoy my stay.
To further the terrible experience the front staff was not helpful in resolving the issue.
